about.p1: Student at ÉTS (École de Technologie Supérieure), which translates as Superior Technology School, in Montreal, Canada. Majoring in Software Engineering, I am slowly discovering the value of computer science in today's world. I've always been passionated about video games and websites and I wanted to know how those complex programs and softwares were made. Luckily now, not only I can understand the technical skills behind those, but I can also recreate them.
about.p2: I have started programming with the C languague, in 2020. This is when I developed an interest in programming. Since then, I enjoy making my own projects and learning new things. In my free time, I enjoy arts and drawing tattoo designs.
